price: 74 « Non, reconnurent-ils, mais nous avons hérité ces pratiques de nos ancêtres. »
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
